item.title: Reading List (December 2019)
item.description: To explain or to predict? - Galit Shmueli Common statistical tests are linear models (or: how to teach stats) - Jonas Kristoffer Lindeløv, 中文版 因果革命 - 于淼 Combining p-values via averaging - Vladimir Vovk, Ruodu Wang How to finish a Ph.D. - Matthias Schonlau
